title: N162s For Sale - Brouthers and Caruthers SGC A
author: Cozumeleno

posts.post_title: N162s For Sale - Brouthers and Caruthers SGC A
posts.post_content:
Two SGC Authentic graded N162 cards:

[STRIKE]Brouthers (HOF)[/STRIKE] - SOLD

Caruthers - $175.00 - I was surprised to not see this get an SGC 10. A few specks of paper loss on the back and some sort of blue specks on the front. If I were keeping this card, I would probably try to resubmit. Was really confused by this one, so perhaps I am missing something.
